metadata.title: CVE-2024-27417 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: fix potential "struct net" leak in inet6_rtm_getaddr()It seems that if userspace provides a correct IFA_TARGET_NETNSID valuebut no IFA_ADDRESS and IFA_LOCAL attributes, inet6_rtm_getaddr()returns -EINVAL with an elevated "struct net" refcount.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
